author: Sallie Ann Burnett
text:
A member would like to know if you can comment/answer the following:
What are the qualifications and selection criteria your city uses to hire a facilitator for annual council goal-setting sessions?
Do you have something similar to a position/job description you would be willing to share?
Is there a preference for using someone outside your locality?
Sallie Ann Burnett, East Regional Director, Alliance for Innovation saburnett@transformgov.org
title: Facilitator criteria for council goal-setting
